messages.subject: Quotes of the Day
messages.msgSnippet: Darling Daughter - Homeschooling is great because you get to spend all day with the people you love most in the world. Sweet Son - Mom, thanks for
messages.messageBody:
Darling Daughter - "Homeschooling is great because you get to spend all day with the people you love most in the world."

Sweet Son - "Mom, thanks for respecting me. You know I like war, and I know that you don't, but you are still taking me to meet the Air Force guys. I really appreciate that."

Un-schooling for all of us continues to grow each day. We are new to this, with an 8 year old son and 11 year old daughter. We just started in December 2008. I feel like I am growing and learning soooo much about myself and my kids. I love it!!!

Thanks for all of your support from this fabulous Yahoo Group.

Love,

Elli
